exclamation.description: Used to encourage or draw attention to the performance of some physical, especially acrobatic, feat.

noun.description: A high pass caught by a leaping teammate who tries to dunk the ball before landing.
examples: she could catch alley-oops all day
he took an alley-oop pass from Vaughn

origin: Early 20th century: perhaps from French allez! go on! + a supposedly French pronunciation of up.
